ObjectPermissions.name: ObjectPermissions
ObjectPermissions.description: Represents the enabled object permissions for the parent PermissionSet.

ParentId.description: The Id of this object’s parent PermissionSet.

PermissionsCreate.description: If true, users assigned to the parent PermissionSet can create records for this object. Requires PermissionsRead for the same object to be true.

PermissionsDelete.description: If true, users assigned to the parent PermissionSet can delete records for this object. Requires PermissionsRead and PermissionsEdit for the same object to be true.

PermissionsEdit.description: If true, users assigned to the parent PermissionSet can edit records for this object. Requires PermissionsRead for the same object to be true.

PermissionsModifyAllRecords.description: If true, users assigned to the parent PermissionSet can edit all records for this object, regardless of sharing settings. Requires PermissionsRead, PermissionsDelete, PermissionsEdit, and PermissionsViewAllRecords for the same object to be true.

PermissionsRead.description: If true, users assigned to the parent PermissionSet can view records for this object.

PermissionsViewAllFields.description: If true, users assigned to the parent PermissionSet can view all fields and field data for this object. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

PermissionsViewAllRecords.description: If true, users assigned to the parent PermissionSet can view all records for this object, regardless of sharing settings. Requires PermissionsRead for the same object to be true.

SobjectType.description: The object’s API name. For example, Merchandise__c.
